1.title: Darr the Afflicter
1.plot: Ramsi, Dana and Nawaf bring Noor Stone bearer John Weller into the 99. Ramzi reveals the secret of the mystical stones and Weller realises that he's only discovered a small part of his stone's power.

2.title: Noora the Light
2.plot: Ramzi is not the only one searching for the Noor Stones. Evil mastermind Rughal also wants them. The 99 try to recruit young stone bearer Miklos a technology wizard, but Rughal gets to him first, and Miklos makes a shocking choice.

3.title: Jabbar the Powerful
3.plot: In Cairo, the 99 recruit Cat, whose Noor Stone makes her a fearsome martial artist. The superheroes attempt to rescue Miklos from Rughal but soon discover they've made a devastating mistake.

4.title: The 99 Unbound
4.plot: The 99 are trapped and Ramzi is held hostage. The superheroes unite their powers to attempt a daring escape but they've underestimated the evil mastermind Rughal, who reveals a shocking truth about himself.

5.title: Fattah the Opener
5.plot: Cat believes the 99's manor to be haunted. The superheroes pursue a new Stone Bearer with amazing superpowers but some very dangerous friends. Rughal begins to regroup, creating his team of super villains.

6.title: Rise of the Red Shroud
6.plot: Rughal creates Red Shroud, a master of electricity. But Red Shroud feels cursed when his new superpowers come between him and his young son Alex. Special Agent Blair Davis might have the answer, but will he reveal his own dark secrets?

7.title: Blackwolf
7.plot: Rughal creates a base in Hong Kong with the help of Blackwolf, a terrifying new ally. In Seville, Alex is caught in an ancient trap deep beneath the 99's manor house. Blair can save him, but a dark force is drawing Blair to Hong Kong.

8.title: Legacy
8.plot: Blair embarks on a secret mission, unaware that is being followed. Blackwolf persuades more hoodlums to join Rughal's gang, transforming them into super villains. An attack on Rughal's HQ ends with tragic results for the 99.

9.title: The Power of One
9.plot: The 99 investigate a series of mysterious disappearances in Shanghai and encounter Rughal's latest creation: an army of brainwashed human Drones. Weller feeling useless after losing his Noor Stone, must retrieve it on his own without his super powers.

10.title: The Sphinx
10.plot: When Rughal is attacked by a masked intruder called Sphinx, he's so impressed by her power, he recruits her to his team. Sphinx's first mission is to settle a long-standing score with Cat. But is Sphinx all she claims to be?

11.title: A Candle in Darkness
11.plot: Teenage superstar Sharifa has won every quiz show on Malaysian TV. Ramzi knows the secret of her success, but must race against Rughal to recruit her. Will Sharifa join the 99 or will she choose the riches promised by a final quiz-show win?

12.title: The Wisdom
12.plot: An aborted heist at London's British Museum convinces Ramzi that Rughal wants a blank Noor Stone to make a clone. The 99 set a trap, but are outwitted by Rughal. Can the 99 stop Rughal before he destroys one of their team?

13.title: Brothers in Arms
13.plot: Rughal lays a trap for Ramzi to seduce him to the dark side, or destroy him and take over the 99. The two men discover a shocking truth about each other. In Rughal's absence, Blackwolf makes his move against the master he's grown to resent.

14.title: Time and Again
14.plot: Exiled in the Mongolian wilderness, Rughal is nursed back to life by a local peasant. In his feverish delirium recalls other times in history when he has confronted Jabbar The Powerful . At his lowest ebb, Rughal finds Destiny is on his side.

15.title: Hide and Seek
15.plot: The 99 search for Rughal, who's recuperating in the mountain refuge of Batina the Hidden and trying to gain influence over the young Stone Bearers she's protecting. Jami tries to act like a grown up around Alex, only to fall flat on his face every time.

16.title: Trial
16.plot: Three academics are kidnapped around the world, including Dr. Ramzi. Held hostage in Cairo, they're put on trial - by Blackwolf. But what is Blackwolf's interest in these retired professors? What is the long forgotten scandal that connects them all?

17.title: Siege of Seville
17.plot: With the 99 in Central America, the junior 99 are alone in Seville, with Buran. Blackwolf's gang attack the mansion, but have underestimated the powers of the youngsters. Their only option is to target Alex with their secret weapon.

18.title: A Rock and a Hard Place
18.plot: Rafie The Lifter, one of the youngest 99, is put to the test when he discovers his cousin, another stone bearer, is working with a gang of criminals. In his Ice Palace, Rughal rediscovers an old friend who could hold the key to Rughal's future.

19.title: Return
19.plot: Nawaf returns to his family in Saudi Arabia for a vacation, only to find himself torn between family obligations and his responsibility to the 99. Learning that Rughal may still be alive, Blackwolf sets off t o hunt him down.

20.title: Ice Storm
20.plot: Batina The Hidden discovers Rughal's Icy hideaway, unaware that she has led Blackwolf to his old enemy. With Mindo's help, Rughal supercharges Murk, but the process threatens to trigger a global catastrophe. Will Rughal turn to the 99 to avert disaster?

21.title: Origins
21.plot: With time running out for him, Rughal knows his only hope for survival lies deep beneath the Seville mansion. But he must persuade Ramzi to help him. In Hong Kong, the 99 lay a trap for Blackwolf, only to discover their plan might have a fatal flaw.

22.title: Rampage in Rome
22.plot: Now led by Sphinx, Blackwolf's gang descend on Rome, where an ultra-modern experimental armoured vehicle is about to be unveiled. They have their own plans for it. Rughal's mission to unearth secrets of the Noor Stones leads him to Baghdad.

23.title: Second Chances
23.plot: The 99 protect a village in Bangladesh from a cyclone. But they must seek help from the mysterious inhabitant of small island nearby which locals believe is haunted. Elsewhere, Rughal finds the key to his survival lies with a sworn enemy.

24.title: Defect
24.plot: Jami The Assembler creates a weapon to fight Sphinx. It's invincible and unstoppable, but it has a serious defect, as the young 99 soon discover. In his Ice Palace, his team together again, Rughal knows he has finally found a way to defeat the 99.

25.title: Triad of Triads Part 1
25.plot: Rughal puts his master-plan into action, and key members of the 99 begin to disappear. It's a race against time, as there will soon be a solar eclipse, and Rughal must be ready when the skies darken.

26.title: Triad of Triads Part 2
26.plot: The young 99 face their greatest challenge as they are called upon to rescue their missing team mates. But Rughal's super-villains are now at their strongest, and Rughal's master-plan is all in place. Nothing can stop him. Almost nothing.

27.title: Power Surge Part 1
27.plot: The 99 discover that sudden power surges from their Noor stones are disabling their superpowers, putting them in danger of their lives.

28.title: Power Surge Part 2
28.plot: In the frozen wasteland of the Himalayas, the 99's most feared enemy is reborn.

29.title: Triad vs. Triplets
29.plot: Dr. Ramzi becomes aware of an unusual trio of youngsters with superhuman powers, painting graffiti on walls in their native London streets. Noora, Cat and Hadya investigate. Unknown to them, the streetwise triplets' powers come not from a Noor stone but from a far more sinister source. At the same time Sphinx is planning a daring heist at the British Museum, aided by a team that includes Hammerforce, Savage and Razors Edge. The 99 attempt to thwart Sphinx's plan, but the super-villains are rescued from the skies by an unexpected ally.

30.title: Abduction
30.plot: Aboard the supersonic VTOL jet, Sphinx and her hapless team discover that their rescuer is a rejuvenated Rughal. A fierce battle at Batina's refuge means that The 99 are in trouble.

31.title: Misdirection
31.plot: With three Noor stone-bearers safely in his custody at the newly constructed Ice Palace, Rughal arranges a wild goose-chase to misdirect the inevitable rescue mission from The 99.

32.title: Possession
32.plot: Keen to develop his team's proficiency with the Noor stones, Ramzi arranges for a group of the 99 to train at an extended retreat in his Seville town house where they are surprised by a supercharged and unwelcome visitor.

33.title: The Gathering Storm
33.plot: Mumita, Hadya and Raqib discover the Ice Palace and the three Noor stone-bearers in suspended animation, meanwhile Rughal is trying to recruit an old ally.

34.title: Where There's Smoke
34.plot: A daring mission in the Kuwaiti oil fields puts Jaleel's powers to the test and Hammerforce and Savage try and pull off a heist at the Chang Corp. Blackwolf is back in the picture.

35.title: Mukhit the Nourisher
35.plot: Helping a stranded Orca whale on a Bahraini beach enables young Salman to discover his powers as Mukhit the Nourisher. In his first test as a stone bearer he helps the team deal with a fearsome enemy.

36.title: Hafiz the Preserver
36.plot: In a remote Brazilian village, Dr. Ramzi comes across young Carlos whose astounding powers with plants mark him out to be Hafiz the Preserver.

37.title: Soft Spot
37.plot: A lonely and deserted late night café in Damascus is the scene for the return of Dr. Auric Blondel, the Pathologist, one of the most ruthless villains in The 99.

38.title: Power Play
38.plot: As Cat, Hadya and Darr narrowly evade arrest in Seville, they find themselves in a battle to save the local Solar Power Station - which has come under attack from their own clones.

39.title: The Sting
39.plot: In his cyber form, Rughal penetrates the 99's computer systems, only to find that Miklos' firewalls are too effective.

40.title: Malware
40.plot: Alex persuades Miklos to create a 'digi-clone' of him, an avatar to search for Blair in the virtual world.

41.title: Destiny
41.plot: Rughal lays a trap in Seville and successfully kidnaps Fadi and Haroun, while Mindo creates a deadly computer virus to hunt down Blair in the cyber-world.

42.title: A Question of Trust
42.plot: Using the power of the Raqib Noor stone now in his possession, Rughal develops a machine that can locate Noor stones around the world.

43.title: Power Failure
43.plot: Power cuts all over the world make the 99 suspicious that Rughal has embarked on a new masterplan to steal energy.

44.title: Identity Crisis
44.plot: As energy supplies surge back to the world, an unperturbed Rughal tells his team his masterplan is still on track, and he needs only a little more power for his goal.

45.title: The Rift
45.plot: Ramzi gives bad news to the 99 - Cat has defected to Rughal. She must have been his spy. Deeply shaken, the 99 regroup and plan their next move.

46.title: Revelation
46.plot: As Batina discovers that Alex is missing from her refuge, a desperate Higgins persuades Ramzi to send the 99 to rescue the youngsters trapped in the Ice Palace.

47.title: Coldhearted
47.plot: Red Shroud steals Zoran's Dakota and flies to the Ice Palace. Ramzi realises that Blair knew Higgins' plan, but no-one could stop him.

48.title: Love and Loss
48.plot: Miklos and Fattah mount an operation to retrieve Zoran's Dakota from the Ice Palace, where it was abandoned by Red Shroud. They narrowly escape the clutches of Blackwolf and Murk in a mid-air battle.

49.title: Tables Turned
49.plot: A young Chinese girl, Kam, walks into the Chang Building. She has a Noor Stone, and is Kabeera The Great. She wants Mr. Chang to help her join the 99.

50.title: Stray Cat
50.plot: Alone and rejected in the icy Himalayan wilderness, Cat survives being mugged by a truck-driver, and escapes by stealing his truck.

51.title: Dark Moon Rising Part 1
51.plot: Shocked that Rughal could create an artificial lunar eclipse, Ramzi seeks help from the Guardian. At the Ice Palace, Rughal is making final preparations for the full moon due the next night.

52.title: Dark Moon Rising Part 2
52.plot: Within minutes, Mindo will succeed in creating a full lunar eclipse and Rughal can finally absorb the triad of triads. But Rughal is alerted to the presence of the 99 in the Ice Palace.

imdb.title: The 99
plot: 99 youngsters from across the globe, 99 ancient Noor stones, 99 superpowers. Ramzi wants them to do good for mankind, but Rughal has other ideas.::Subniv Babuta
